summary: Represent the company's interest in universal and consistent fit aesthetics and proper construction of garments; standardize product fit and construction specifications. Skilled in specification writing, fitting, pattern making and sewing; knowledgeable in textiles; experienced in coordinating with overseas contractors; proficient in flat sketching; strong administrative abilities; bilingual in English and Spanish.

experience.title: Apparel Technical Designer
experience.description: Work with Design on seasonal development to identify styles requiring tech design support; issue initial specs to expedite first proto; manage fit cycle approval from development through stock; interface with Design, Product Development, Merchants, Production Quality Assurance and Suppliers to ensure updated information is communicated; measure garments for fittings; maintain fit logs and prepare for fittings; maintain labeling, packaging and construction standards; create and maintain fit comments and specs in Books; resolve technical issues with factories; review graded specs, tolerances and construction for consistency; maintain seasonal spec binders; communicate delivery issues and work with cross-functional team to resolve outstanding issues.

experience.title: Specification Writer, Quality Control Assistant
experience.description: Wrote specification sheets including sewing construction, trim, grading, pattern and label parts; attended fittings and corresponded with contractors overseas; liaison between Spec Department and other departments such as Quality Control, Design, Trims, Pattern Making, Washing and Shrinkage, Fabrication Matching, Sample Room, Grading and Marking; analyzed Line Development Management Reports for domestic and overseas operations to ensure deadlines were met; kept and updated extensive database and books; trained new hires.

experience.title: Specification Writer
experience.description: Wrote Specification Sheets including Sewing construction, Trim, Grading, Patterns and label parts; liaison between Spec Department and other departments such as Quality Control, Design, Trims, Pattern Making, Sample Room, Grading and Marking; managed the distribution and tracking of the specification packages from production through to delivery to factories, warehouses and relevant personnel; monitored performance against deadlines and reported progress to production group at weekly reviews; kept and updated extensive database and books; trained new hires.

experience.title: Production Line Supervisor
experience.description: Supervised line operations and staff; supervised and researched daily water treatment; calculated required quantities of raw materials for daily production and controlled output against plan; investigated and reported line efficiency on a daily basis.

experience.title: Freelance Teacher
experience.description: Taught Chemistry, Mathematics and Physics as a freelancer.
